title: Mr. Noisy
description: Mr. Noisy was a very, very noisy person. For example: when most people sneeze you can hear them from the next room. When Mr. Noisy sneezes, you can hear him from the next country! The residents of Wobbletown are tired of being shouted at by Mr. Noisy. Can they change his very, very noisy ways?  Enjoy this special edition larger size of the classic Mr. Men books with your children.
author: Roger Hargreaves
